pages.text: $(li)The Popped Chorus Fruit is an item that can be obtained cooking a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/chorus_fruit)Chorus Fruit$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft $(l)Purpur Blocks$(), $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/end_rod)End Rods$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:decoration/buzzier_bees/scented_candle)Scented Candles$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
